long_description: Your little ripper will appreciate the easy-to-use straps and buckles of the Burton Grom Snowboard bindings. These boys' bindings are a great choice for young ones starting out on the slopes. Mitten-friendly Onestraps(R) feature oversize everything; ergonomic, ratcheting tongue makes getting in and out easier that ever. Lightweight, single-component polycarbonate baseplates create moderate flex and consistent response for a versatile ride on all terrain. Ultra lightweight single-component highbacks are easy flexing; highbacks rotate side to side to follow the natural contours of his calves, optimizing power and comfort. Kid-friendly Smooth Glide(TM) buckles with wide-mouth openings are easy for little paws to grab.
